name: Towny Bar
summary: Discover an Idle Management Game full of surprises. Take the reins of an old abandoned bar and improve and expand it to the delight of the inhabitants of Towny Town. During the story you will meet some of your neighbors, who will gladly help you in your hard tasks. Grow ingredients in your garden, craft drinks in your cellar, run your own arcade, unlock special abilities and discover forgotten mysteries, but above all, serve as many drinks as you can!
